I am not sure this is the same problem, but I got several errors doing the
following steps:
1) Start a new workspace in self-hosting
2) Go to Preferences>Java>Classpath Variables
3) Add a new variable pointing to a folder on your local drive
4) If you open the PDE Runtime Error view, you can see:
!MESSAGE VariableBlock: Classpath variable with null value: TEST_SRC
!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.ui 4 10001 Apr 22, 2003 12:24:21.140
!MESSAGE VariableBlock: Classpath variable with null value: TEST_LIB
!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.ui 4 10001 Apr 22, 2003 12:24:21.187
!MESSAGE VariableBlock: Classpath variable with null value: TEST_ROOT

Hopefully this is related to the same problem.

Unfortunatly I never was able to reproduce this bug. Please reopen if you still 
get this.
